Match on LTC DoB and dates of LTC incidence

Source: R/match_on_ltcs.R
match_on_ltcs.Rd

Match on LTC changed_dob and dates of LTC incidence (based on hospital incidence only).

Usage

match_on_ltcs(
  data,
  year,
  ltc_data = read_file(get_ltcs_path(year)) %>% slfhelper::get_chi()
)

Arguments

data

episode files

year

financial year, e.g. '1920'

ltc_data

The LTC data for the year

Value

data matched with long term conditions

On this page
